content: The Wind Chime is a Curios item that is rather exclusive in Black Myth: Wukong. You can get the Wind Chime Curios from purchasing the Deluxe Edition of the game or the Deluxe Edition upgrade pack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Wind_Chime.md', within the main section titled 'Wind Chime'.
The content is as follows:
The Wind Chime is a Curios item that is rather exclusive in Black Myth: Wukong. You can get the Wind Chime Curios from purchasing the Deluxe Edition of the game or the Deluxe Edition upgrade pack.
